org.dellroad.stuff.schema
Class SpringSchemaUpdater

java.lang.Object
  org.dellroad.stuff.schema.SchemaUpdater
      org.dellroad.stuff.schema.SpringSchemaUpdater
All Implemented Interfaces:
BeanFactoryAware, InitializingBean
public class SpringSchemaUpdater
extends SchemaUpdater
implements BeanFactoryAware, InitializingBean

SchemaUpdater optimized for use with Spring.

  • databaseNeedsInitialization() and applyAction() are overridden to use Spring's JdbcTemplate so Spring DataAccessExceptions are thrown.
  • databaseNeedsInitialization() is overridden to catch exceptions and more precisely to filter out false positives.
  • getOrderingTieBreaker() is overridden to break ties by ordering updates in the same order as they are defined in the bean factory.
  • This class implements InitializingBean and verifies all required properties are set.
  • If no updates are explicitly configured, then all SchemaUpdates found in the containing bean factory are automatically configured.

An example of how this class can be combined with custom XML to define an updater, all its updates, and a SchemaUpdatingDataSource that automatically updates the database schema: 

  <beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
    xmlns:dellroad-stuff="http://dellroad-stuff.googlecode.com/schema/dellroad-stuff"
    xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
    xmlns:p="http://www.springframework.org/schema/p"
    xsi:schemaLocation="
      http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans
        http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans-3.0.xsd
      http://dellroad-stuff.googlecode.com/schema/dellroad-stuff
        http://dellroad-stuff.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/schemas/dellroad-stuff-1.0.xsd">

     <!-- DataSource that automatically updates the database schema -->
     <bean id="dataSource" class="org.dellroad.stuff.schema.SchemaUpdatingDataSource"
       p:schemaUpdater-ref="schemaUpdater"/>

     <!-- Database updater; note use of dellroad-stuff's update table initialization for MySQL -->
     <bean id="schemaUpdater" class="org.dellroad.stuff.schema.SpringSchemaUpdater">
         <property name="databaseInitialization">
             <dellroad-stuff:sql resource="classpath:databaseInit.sql"/>
         </property>
         <property name="updateTableInitialization">
             <dellroad-stuff:sql resource="classpath:org/dellroad/stuff/schema/updateTable-mysql.sql"/>
         </property>
     </bean>

      <!-- Schema update to add the 'phone' column to the 'User' table -->
      <dellroad-stuff:sql-update id="addPhone">ALTER TABLE User ADD phone VARCHAR(64)</dellroad-stuff:sql-update>

      <!-- Schema update to run some complicated external SQL script -->
      <dellroad-stuff:sql-update id="majorChanges" depends-on="addPhone" resource="classpath:majorChanges.sql"/>

      <!-- add more schema updates over time as needed... -->

  </beans>

It is required that this updater and all of its schema updates are defined in the same ListableBeanFactory.

databaseNeedsInitialization

public boolean databaseNeedsInitialization(DataSource dataSource)
Determine if the database needs initialization.

The implementation in SpringSchemaUpdater invokes SELECT COUNT(*) FROM UPDATETABLE and checks for a BadSqlGrammarException.

Overrides:
databaseNeedsInitialization in class SchemaUpdater
Throws:
DataAccessException - if there is any other problem

applyAction

protected void applyAction(DataSource dataSource,
                           DatabaseAction action)
Apply a DatabaseAction to a DataSource.

The implementation in SpringSchemaUpdater uses JdbcTemplate to apply the modification so that Spring DataAccessExceptions are thrown in case of errors.

Overrides:
applyAction in class SchemaUpdater
Throws:
DataAccessException - if there is any problem

getOrderingTieBreaker

protected Comparator<SchemaUpdate> getOrderingTieBreaker()
Get the preferred ordering of two updates that do not have any predecessor constraints (including implied indirect constraints) between them.

The Comparator returned by the implementation in SpringSchemaUpdater sorts updates in the same order that they appear in the BeanFactory.

Overrides:
getOrderingTieBreaker in class SchemaUpdater
